entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa steady
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: E 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
